Instruction: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat (around 400Â°F).
Cut the plums in half and remove the pits.
In a small bowl, mix together honey, cinnamon, and vanilla extract.
Brush the cut sides of the plum halves with the honey mixture.
Place the plum halves, cut side down, on the preheated grill.
Grill the plums for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until grill marks appear and the plums are softened.
Remove the grilled plum halves from the grill and serve them warm as a sweet and juicy side dish.
